info.title: VDX Url Handler API
info.description:
API description for the VDX Url Handler interface which allow [TODO]

Versions:

  • 1.0.0
    • New API

get.summary: Health url to check if the service is available
get.description: Use this as an initial test to see if the API is up running and replying.

get.summary: Decrypt given CSN parameter and redirect to portal link based on the found information
get.description:
This service decrypt the incomming CSN string and redirect the call to the correct portal link based on the decrypted values

Example of encrypted url:
http://localhost:8080/adhoc/10?CSN=zyxLxb0svpcvyMRHmDZJIk1BZ4eekXAJ4L8%2FtMjwEuGnFUgzhFfSyjzcGBRme3AgdgNh8wX5CWwc8Jumj27wiw%3D%3D
Key to decrypt: YWJjZGVmZ2hpamtsMTIzNA==
Result when decrypted: 1234&startTime=2019-09-09T09:09:09&email=john@doe.com

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: the organizationId for the requested information, external epic id

parameters.name: CSN
parameters.description:
an encrypted string which consist of the following parts
* (meeting id): meeting id within the video api
* email: organized by within the video api (optional)
* startTime: meeting starttime within the video api
* client: scheme part of portal link to replace what is within the portal link in the video api (optional)
* userid: organized by with the api (optional). Used when email is empty

Example of decrypted url:
12345&email=john@doe.com&startTime=2019-10-01T09:09:09&client=pexip&userId=some_user

302.description: Found. Redirect to the portal link

400.description:
Bad request. This happens when
* CSN parameter is empty
* organizationId is not found
* the encrypted string can not be decrypted
* parameters in the decrypted string can not be parsed
* scheduling information or meeting can not be found or updated
* the redirect could not be performed
